Description: The top rallycross variant competes in formerly WorldRX. Equipped with H4DPF 2.0L i4 engine, 4 bar anti-lag turbo with 45mm restrictor, mechanical center LSD with with hydrualic shaft/clutch disengage mechanism and 6-speed sequential gearbox. Converted from Rally2 spec, RX1 spec has around 290mm of damper travel and 355mm brake discs.
